clinical_history: Routine obstetric ultrasound for fetal growth.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: Right kidney demonstrates enlarged, no hydronephrosis.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Testes are ill-defined with normal vascularity.
Liver appears enlarged with no focal lesions.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 3.97 bpm.
Common bile duct measures 26.17 mm, within normal limits.
